Enhance user experiences.
Bug Fixes.

Enhance user experiences.
Bug Fixes.

•Enhance and Improve Customer Experience by revamping the design.
•Quick access to the popular features of Smart Employee App.
•Enable Enterprise Document Control to allow managers to approve and reject official letters.
•Full integration with Smart Path Platform (Performance Management).
•Get locations and maps for government departments.
•Review Notifications’ history and check the action history of every notification
•Find Employees of Dubai Government
•New Leave Balance screen that includes Bradford Factor and show Rest and Admin Leaves
•Review your Dynamic Request and monitor the status of your request
•Bug Fix

•Enhance and Improve Customer Experience by revamping the design.
•Quick access to the popular features of Smart Employee App.
•Enable Enterprise Document Control to allow managers to approve and reject official letters.

•Review Notifications’ history and check the action history of every notification
•Find Employees of Dubai Government
•New Leave Balance screen that includes Bradford Factor and show Rest and Admin Leaves
•Review your Dynamic Request and monitor the status of your request
•Bug Fix

•Enable Enterprise Document Control to allow managers to approve and reject official letters (CTS) and adding more actions.
•Allow the employee to check and report the maintenance request.
•Improve app performance and applying configuration caching
•Enhance Newsroom Design
•Embedded Analytics Dashboard
•Enhance Inbox loading mechanism and show loading failure message.
•Bug Fix
